1.5.name: wordpress/good-gallery
1.5.description:
This plugin gives users of GoodGallery.net the possibility to integrate their gallery made with the goodgallery.net website in their wordpress website. To create an account for a gallery you must sign up on http://www.goodgallery.net

GoodGallery.net gives his user the possibility to create, manage and view gallery's in a very easy way. After creating an account, you can start adding categories and pictures. When you are finished you kan watch your gallery via our view page, or by integrating the gallery into your own wordpress website.
